mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EPISODE_INFO (EPISODE_ID, NOVEL_ID, EPISODE_IMAGE) VALUES (#{episodeId}, #{novelId}, #{episodeImage})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOVEL_EPISODE SET TITLE = #{title}, EPISODE_NUM = #{episodeNum}, CONTENT = #{content}
mapper.select: SELECT EPISODE_ID, NOVEL_ID, TITLE, EPISODE_NUM, CONTENT FROM NOVEL_EPISODE WHERE EPISODE_ID = #{episodeId}
